title: Incorrect Username or Password?
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/926b3e202d9dc947f3f50b1be633f448.png

----

> **Update - 5/26/2017 @ 3:00pm Pacific **
The remainder of these login issues should be smoothed out at this point. If you're still seeing an incorrect username or password when attempting to login, please send us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

----
> ** Update - 5/25/2017 @ 11:30am Pacific**
> We deployed a fix for this issue overnight!  You should be able to update to the current patch without further login or patch mis-match errors.  Let us know that this worked for you by confirming below!

--- 


>** Update - 5/23/2017 @ 2:30pm Pacific**
> 
> Hey guys, we have been working on a workaround in the meantime and believe the following steps can help resolve the issue:
> 
**For PC**
> - Locate LeagueClientSettings.yaml within C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
> - Open it with a text editor (such as Notepad, TextEdit, or Notepad++) and find gameflow-patcher-lock. It should have a number there.
> - Change the number to read "null" (without quotes)
> - Save the file.
> - Restart the client.
> 
> **For Mac**
1) Start and log onto League of Legends
2) Open Finder
3) Go to Applications
4) Right-click on League of Legends
5) Select Show Package Contents
6) Open Contents
7) Open LoL
8) Open Config
9) Locate LeagueClientSettings.yaml
10) Open it with a text editor and and find gameflow-patcher-lock. It should have a number there.
11)  Change the number to read "null" (without quotes)
12) Save file and restart the client

> Let us know if this helped you in the comments below!
-Porocles

---

Many of our players have run into this strange issue where the client tells them that their username or password is incorrect, but they are still able to login to the support site without any issues.

It seems that this is being caused when the patcher doesn't realize that it needs to check for a patch, or that the patcher is still on the incorrect patch. Some players have been able to work around this by grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a *Force Repatch*, while others have noticed that after waiting a bit their client will update and the issue resolves itself.

If that method doesn't seem to help, try switching your region to something different which should force a patch. After that patch, switch your region back to normal and try logging in.

I appreciate any feedback about what may have worked or not worked for you guys, and if these steps aren't helping I encourage you to submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that our tech team can help you troubleshoot this!

replies.body: i would try this, but that line already reads null in my file.

Thanks for the update!  If it's already at null and the issue persists, have you tried the force repatch yet?  This option is available through downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Let me know if that works for you.
Please fix this problem its still happing to me I haven't been able to play league I've done all the recommended steps to resolve the issue and its still happing
the hextech tool worked for me
already tried force repatching and fresh reinstall through the HRT. still not working.
please fix the issue I got it to work once and now the same issues keeps arising

These steps were for an issue that arose a little over a month ago. If you're having problems getting signed into your account for any reason, I suggest hitting up our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what might be going on.
I tried but it's already null
If you're still having problems logging in, do me a favor and try switching the region on the patcher to something different, like NA, and then switching back. Let me know if that works!
nothing I've done will fix the issue and I've done all the recommend steps
well thanks , I tried it but it didn't work , I ever reinstalled the game , but that hextech tool thing did the job !

I did the recommend step above and I did the repatch as well as restart client on the hextech tool still doesn't let me sign in on any of my accounts, also I was able to play perfectly without any issues before you retired the old client this problem started when the new client was created, I'm not sure if this information helps just thought you should know
I have tried both of these, as well as running as an admin, and neither worked.

I've been able to see some success getting passed this weird login thing by switching the region on their client. After changing it and then changing it back to normal, you should get a patch to download and then you'll be able to sign back in. Let me know if it doesn't work for you though!
I used the hextech repair tool, and it seems positive. I was able to play one game so far.
Nope, second game failed, same as before
